abstract: Libyan officials apologize for bombing Greek-owned tanker ship, saying that fighter jets made mistake; ship had been off coast of city of Derna, which is controlled by Islamist extremists.
lead_paragraph: Fighter jets sent by Libya’s internationally recognized government bombed a Greek-owned tanker ship off an eastern city controlled by Islamist extremists on Monday.
snippet: Fighter jets sent by Libya’s internationally recognized government bombed a Greek-owned tanker ship off an eastern city controlled by Islamist extremists on Monday.
